title: @Riot KateyKhaos, While working on kennen's visual bug
body: Do you think that some upwards QoL tweaks can be considered being given to his W? Specifically allowing the empowered hit bonus damage to stack from and apply to towers and make it on a second timer charge that is reduced on-hit by X amount.
